1370: Euerardus was born in Kerckstraet in 1370.
Got married to Mette at age 33 in 1370.
1385: Lost his wife Mette while she was giving birth to Hatebrandus in 1385.
1372: Had a daughter with Mette, Mette, at age 35.
Lost daughter Mette when Mette was 1 years old.
1378: Had a son with Mette, Herbert, at age 41.
1379: Had a daughter with Mette, Gerburgis, at age 42.
1381: Had a son with Mette, Coekeа, at age 44.
1382: Had a son with Mette, Tiuri, at age 45.
